channel.title: Job War Insane Chris Fashion India on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Job War Insane Chris Fashion India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Strange encounters with beast men.
item.description: So this weekend was incredible. It was also INSANE. seriously. on friday I hung out with a bunch of friends at the ladytron show. Which btw, was really great. ladytron did a remarkable job of representing their sound exactly how it is on the record. Dayum.. that concert was such a fashion show.. heh. so fun. my friend rachel came with.. which was cool.. I haven’t seen her in such a long time.
